pages.text: Umbra is the magic of shadows, darkness, and the unseen. It allows its practitioners to manipulate the absence of light, creating illusions, cloaking themselves, or summoning creatures of the dark.

Umbra is a subtle and deceptive magic, allowing its users to control what is hidden from the world. Practitioners of Umbra are often stealthy, able to strike from the shadows or disappear without a trace. It is a magic of secrecy, shadow, and stealth.
